languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they gain +1 more. Whenever the Master Tactician or their allies lose momentum, they lose −1 less.
languages.original_text: При любом получении {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастер-тактик{/g} и его союзники получают на 1 больше. При любом расходе моментума мастер-тактик и его союзники теряют на 1 меньше.

traits.locale_text: Any Momentum gain for Tactician and their allies is increased by 1, any Momentum loss is decreased by 1.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}或盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}时，额外获得1点士气。每当战术专家或盟友失去士气时，损失的士气减少1点。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they gain +1 more. Whenever the Master Tactician or their allies lose momentum, they lose −1 less.

traits.locale_text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}或盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}时，额外获得1点士气。每当战术专家或盟友失去士气时，损失的士气减少1点。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} o sus aliados ganen {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}, ganan +1 más. Cada vez que el maestro táctico o sus aliados pierdan ímpetu, pierden −1 menos.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they gain +1 more. Whenever the Master Tactician or their allies lose momentum, they lose −1 less.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} o sus aliados ganen {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}, ganan +1 más. Cada vez que el maestro táctico o sus aliados pierdan ímpetu, pierden −1 menos.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} oder seine Verbündeten {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} erhalten, erlangen sie +1 mehr. Wenn der Meistertaktiker oder seine Verbündeten Dynamik verlieren, bekommen sie −1 weniger abgezogen.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they gain +1 more. Whenever the Master Tactician or their allies lose momentum, they lose −1 less.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} oder seine Verbündeten an {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} gewinnen, erlangen sie +1 mehr. Immer wenn der Meistertaktiker oder seine Verbündeten Dynamik verlieren, bekommen sie −1 weniger abgezogen.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g} ou ses alliés acquièrent de la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}, ils en gagnent 1 point supplémentaire. Chaque fois que le maître tacticien ou ses alliés perdent de la fougue, ils en perdent 1 point de moins.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they gain +1 more. Whenever the Master Tactician or their allies lose momentum, they lose −1 less.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le Tacticien ou ses alliés acquièrent de la Fougue, ils gagnent 1 point. Chaque fois que le Tacticien ou ses alliés perdent de la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Fougue{/g}, ils perdent 1 point.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}またはその味方が{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を得る時、獲得量が+1増加する。戦略の達人またはその味方が推進力を失う時、減少量が−1減少する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} or their allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they gain +1 more. Whenever the Master Tactician or their allies lose momentum, they lose −1 less.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}またはその味方が{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を得る時、獲得量が+1増加する。戦略の達人またはその味方が推進力を失う時、減少量が−1減少する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen{/g} veya dost birimleri her {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazandığında kazanılan miktara 1 puan eklenir. Usta Taktisyen veya dost birimleri her momentum kaybettiğinde kaybedilen miktara 1 puan eklenir.
